{{ZScriptNote}} __NOTOC__
bool '''CheckIfInTargetLOS'''([double ''fov''[, int ''flags''[, double ''dist_max''[, double ''dist_close'']]]])
== Usage == Checks if the Actor is in line of sight of its target.
=== Parameters === *''fov'' - 0 by default. If greater than 0, check if the Actor is within the specified field of view of its target. *''flags'' - 0 by default. Sets the the flags for the check. *''dist_max'' - 0 by default. If greater than 0, sets the range the Actor must be in. *''dist_close'' - 0 by default. If greater than 0, sets the max distance that the '''JLOSF_CLOSE*''' flags will be used.
=== Return value === Returns true if the Actor was in line of sight of its target.
== Examples == {{noexamples}}
